moduleMetadataJson.name: Gather Ticket Granting Service (TGS) tickets for User Service Principal Names (SPN)
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will try to find Service Principal Names that are associated with normal user accounts.
        Since normal accounts' passwords tend to be shorter than machine accounts, and knowing that a TGS request
        will encrypt the ticket with the account the SPN is running under, this could be used for an offline
        bruteforcing attack of the SPNs account NTLM hash if we can gather valid TGS for those SPNs.
        This is part of the kerberoast attack research by Tim Medin (@timmedin).
author: Alberto Solino
Jacob Robles

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: pass
options.description: Password for the domain user account
